title: SparkyLinux Kicks Off 2024 with MLVWM Macintosh-Like WM and Calamares 3.3
description:
SparkyLinux 2024.01 distribution is now available for download with Calamares 3.3 installer, support for the MLVWM Macintosh-Like WM, support for Linux kernel 6.7, and more.

The post SparkyLinux Kicks Off 2024 with MLVWM Macintosh-Like WM and Calamares 3.3 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Calibre 7.4 Open-Source Ebook Manager Adds Support for Supernote A6X2 Nomad
description:
Calibre 7.4 open-source ebook management software is now available for download with support for the Supernote A6X2 Nomad ebook reader.

The post Calibre 7.4 Open-Source Ebook Manager Adds Support for Supernote A6X2 Nomad appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
